CHAT.comment: MOT reads VHC to Bro so Chi asks INV2 her questions. Task not understood as for both of them. The letter is interesting.
Dear mom - I - am - so - happy that you are happy to mom. and baby is happy to mama. From Chi. [this is final version - an earlier version takes up most of the page]

u.a: Chi and Bro playing in background
context notes - task not understood as project for both PC and TC . Also Bro was getting fussy and wanted attention .
lots_of noise around such as screaming children and a car horn honking outside; Mot on Saturday in VHC
